actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for youth sport programs at public housing projects that have substantial drug problems.
short_title: Special Program of Recreational Training Act of 1990

summary.text: Special Program of Recreational Training Act of 1990 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants for youth sports programs in public housing projects with substantial drug problems to qualified: (1) States; (2) local governments; (3) public housing agencies; and (4) nonprofit organizations providing youth sports services programs. Amends the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1988 to allocate appropriations.

titles.title: Special Program of Recreational Training Act of 1990
A bill to provide for youth sport programs at public housing projects that have substantial drug problems.
